name: STWebHistory
desc: The object you use to delete web-usage data.

items.name: init(bundleIdentifier: String)
items.desc: Creates a web history instance to delete web-usage data associated to the bundle identifier you specify.

items.name: func deleteAllHistory()
items.desc: Deletes all web history associated with the bundle identifier you specified during initialization.

items.name: func deleteHistory(during: DateInterval)
items.desc: Deletes web history that occurred during the date interval you specify.

items.name: func deleteHistory(for: URL)
items.desc: Deletes all the web history for the URL you specify.
